gameOver.title: Game over
gameOver.message: Sorry, you lost! The corrrect word was:

rules.title: How to play
rules.rule2: All words consist of exactly 5 letters
rules.rule3: If the letter is correct and in the correct position, the letter will become green
rules.rule4: If the letter is correct, but in the wrong position, the letter will become yellow
rules.rule5: The yellow highlight will not show up if you have more of a letter than in the correct answer
